alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:08PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson and northeastern Madison Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1008 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Market, or 8 miles east of Moores Mill, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gurley, New Market, Maysville, Princeton, Garth, Ryland, Hollytree, Brownsboro, Larkin and Plevna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
